archimate:Requirement.name: AS.1.1.8a: a) reviewing the extent of control implementation (e.g. verifying whether controls required by standards and frameworks are in place and work as intended, positioning against peers through benchmarking and validating technical configuration)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
